quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma, which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Here's to the crazy ones, the misfits, the rebels, the troublemakers, the round pegs in the square holes...because the ones who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world, are the ones who do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: It is how we choose what we do, and how we approach it, that will determine whether the sum of our days adds up to a formless blur, or to something resembling a work of art
author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quote: Self belief is immensely powerful. The most successful people I know believe in themselves almost to the point of delusion.
author: Sam Altman

quote: Be curious, and however difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at. It matters that you don't just give up
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Whatever you can do or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Study hard what interests you the most in the most undisciplined, irreverent and original manner possible
author: Richard Feynman

quote: What I cannot create, I do not understand.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: My mother … had a wonderful sense of humor, and I learned from her that the highest forms of understanding we can achieve are laughter and human compassion.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: As a day well spent makes sleep seem pleasant, so a life well employed makes death pleasant.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: You can have no dominion greater or less than that over yourself.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Life needs to be more than just solving every day problems. You need to wake up and be excited about the future
author: Elon Musk

quote: If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.
author: Elon Musk

quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
author: Arthur C Clarke

quote: The true delight is in the finding out rather than in the knowing.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: One man’s ‘magic’ is another man’s engineering.
author: Robert Heinlein

quote: Life is trying things to see if they work.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: I tell you, we are here on Earth to fart around, and don't let anybody tell you different.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: When something is such a creative medium as the web, the limits to it are our imagination.
author: Marvin Minsky

quote: Innovation is serendipity, so you don’t know what people will make.
author: Marvin Minsky

quote: Computer languages of the future will be more concerned with goals and less with procedures specified by the programmer.
author: Marvin Minsky

quote: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.
author: Alan Turing

quote: Those who can imagine anything, can create the impossible.
author: Alan Turing

quote: I've always been more interested in the future than in the past.
author: Grace Hopper

quote: A good scientist is a person with original ideas. A good engineer is a person who makes a design that works with as few original ideas as possible. There are no prima donnas in engineering.
author: Freeman Dyson

quote: There is a great satisfaction in building good tools for other people to use.
author: Freeman Dyson

quote: I never did anything worth doing by accident, nor did any of my inventions come indirectly through accident, except the phonograph. No, when I have, fully decided that a result is worth getting, I go about it, and make trial after trial, until it comes.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Don't worry about what anybody else is going to do. The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: The important thing, once you have enough to eat and a nice house, is what you can do for others, what you can contribute to the enterprise as a whole.
author: Donald Knuth

quote: That as we enjoy great advantages from the inventions of Others, we should be glad of an opportunity to serve others by any invention of ours, and this we should do freely and generously.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: There is nothing like a dream to create the future.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Live in the future, then build what's missing
author: Paul Graham

quote: The way to come up with new ideas is not to try explicitly to, but to try to solve problems and simply not discount weird hunches you have in the process.
author: Paul Graham

quote: If you aren’t embarrassed by the first version of your product, you shipped too late.
author: Reid Hoffman

quote: For life in permanent beta, the trick is to never stop starting.
author: Reid Hoffman

quote: Start a personal blog and begin developing a public reputation and public portfolio of work that’s not tied to your employer.
author: Reid Hoffman

quote: Until you value yourself, you won’t value your time. Until you value your time, you will not do anything with it.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: In a world that’s changing so quickly, the biggest risk you can take is not taking any risk
author: Peter Thiel

quote: There is a power to obsession and being able to absolutely obsess over something and throw your life’s work.
author: John Carmack

quote: The programmers of tomorrow are the wizards of the future
author: Gabe Newell

quote: I've always been more interested in the future than in the past.
author: Grace Hopper
